question: PM Narendra Modi inaugurate highway projects worth Rs.5,925 crore in __________.
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurate development projects worth Rs. 5,925 crore during his two-day visit to poll-bound Gujarat. He laid the foundation for construction of Rs 962 crore Cable Stayed Signature Bridge between Beyt Dwarka and Okha on NH-51, Gujarat. He lay the foundation stone for a greenfield airport located near Rajkot and inaugurate a fully automatic milk processing and packaging plant in Surendranagar. He will also lay the foundation stone for widening of Ahmedabad-Rajkot section of NH-47 to six lanes.
